name: Gobbler's Quest 1983
description:
This is about 1/12th of one level of a simple platform game where the mechanics are fun and the characters are silly and it could be turned into something bigger.  Let me know in the comments if you want more levels and I should be able to make some (I already have some designed). Try to make it to the big level exit to the right.

Move with the arrows and jump with the z key (space and shift might work too but shift works different for some reason).  Gamepad should work too.  You can jump on the heads of your dapper enemy who is named The Earl of Cluck.   If you run into them from the side twice you died.
